item.description:
You are invited!

BBQ at Rob Elaâ€™s home. 63 South Oxford Road, Millbury MA 01527
(508)865-7307
(Please go around back to the entrance to his apartment) Games and Grill will be set up out back!

Monday May 25th @ 1:30pm

Rob will provide Hamburgers, Hot Dogs and Kielbasa on the grill.

Please bring drinks, Lawn chairs and a dish to share. (i.e.: Salads, appetizers or desert).

There will be Volley Ball; if you have any yard games that you can bring, please do.
Hope to see you there!
item.name: Memorial Day BBQ at Rob's
